plot: Jessica is an artist who rolls hard and lives large as she comes up with new ways to keep creating despite the continuing loss of her mobility.
title: Grounded by Reality
plot_es: Jessica is an artist who rolls hard and lives large as she comes up with new ways to keep creating despite the continuing loss of her mobility.
plot_en: Jessica is an artist who rolls hard and lives large as she comes up with new ways to keep creating despite the continuing loss of her mobility.
